entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
